item.title: Moment Movie
item.description: Within eleven years of motion pictures, the films moved from a novelty show to an established large-scale entertainment industry. Films moved from a single shot, completely made by one person with a few assistants, towards films several minutes long consisting of several shots, which were made by large companies in something like industrial conditions. By 1900, the first motion pictures that can be considered as “films” – emerged, and film-makers began to introduce basic editing techniques and film narrative. Movie Seen it, Love it Sato Ken (Japanese: Sato Takeo / さとう たける Satō Takeru, March 21, 1989 -), Japanese actor, affiliated with Amuse Brokerage. In 2007, he starred in the special drama “Kamen Rider Electric King”, and he was noticed by one person’s performances. Since 2012, the live-action movie “Rurouni Kenshin”, which starred in the topic comics, has been a great success. It broke through 12.5 billion in the local box office in Japan and launched its second sequel, “Kyoto Fire” on August 1, 2014. “And the last moments of the legend” on September 13.
